Name: NECROSIS : RECONFIGURATED
About the game: BE FAST, PLAY FAST Enjoy Now one Multiplayer and CO-OP Experience for one cheap price! The Game has Multiple Gamemodes on the Multiplayer, such as the olds and legendaries 'Team DeathMatch', 'Domination', 'Elimination', 'Free-For-All', 'Gun Game' and more! For The CO-OP You can Play 'THE PLAGUE' One Fast Paced Zombies Survival Gamemode that you have to survive the zombie waves and the boss rounds! HUGE GUN VARIETY Try Now More than 50 Different Unlockable Guns, With different customizations like: Ammo Types, Sights, Muzzles and Skins! with 105 Levels to Unlock! FULL BOT SUPPORT If you don't want to play on any online server (Or if there aren't any server online), you can play with BOTS!
